titleStmt.title: Chymical secrets and rare experiments in physick & philosophy with figures collected and experimented / by the Honourable and learned Sir Kenelm Digby ...
titleStmt.author: Digby, Kenelm, Sir, 1603-1665.

notesStmt.note: Subtitle: Containing many rare and unheard of medicines, menstruums and alkahests, the philosophical arcanum of Flamel Artesius, Pentanus and Zachary, with the true secret of volatizing the fixed salt of tartar.
"Published since his death by George Hartman, chymist, and steward to the aforesaid Sir Kenelm"
Part 2 has separate t.p. with imprint: London : Printed for the author, 1682.
Reproduction of original in British Library.
